Title: The Casket Girls

Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Claire Holt, Phoebe Tonkin
Plot: As the French Quarter prepares for its annual celebration of the Casket Girls Festival, Cami suffers through as Davina attempts to free her of Klaus' mind compulsion. Elijah and Marcel form...
